channel.title: TravelOps on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in TravelOps on Validated Patterns

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Deploying the TravelOps pattern Prerequisites An OpenShift cluster To create an OpenShift cluster, go to the Red Hat Hybrid Cloud console.

item.title: Ideas for customization
item.description: About customizing the pattern TravelOps pattern One of the major goals of the Validated Patterns development process is to create modular, customizable demos.

item.title: Cluster Sizing
item.description: Unresolved directive in <stdin> - include::modules/travelops/metadata-travelops.adoc[] {display_name} pattern hub/datacenter cluster size The {display_name} pattern has been tested with a defined set of specifically tested configurations that represent the most common combinations that Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform customers are using or deploying for the x86_64 architecture.
